title: Portfolio Website
description: A dynamic, self-designed website created with Python and Streamlit Library, hosted on AWS and featuring seamless CI/CD integration through GitHub Actions.

title: Company Website
description: A professional business website featuring a contact form and a showcase of products/services, implemented for enhanced customer interaction and engagement.

title: PDF Invoice Generator Script
description: A Python application that translates Excel files into clear, well-formatted PDF invoices, expediting business billing processes.

title: NASA Picture of the Day Website
description: A visually-striking website built to display NASA's daily featured images with comprehensive title and description details.

title: Flask Weather API
description: A Flask and SQLite-based application that provides average temperature data for any given day at various European weather stations.

title: Forecast Data App
description: A sophisticated application built with Streamlit, designed to display a comprehensive weather forecast for upcoming days.

title: Happiness Data App
description: An insightful data visualization application, utilizing Streamlit to portray the correlation between generosity, happiness, and GDP across various countries.

title: Book Analysis Jupyter Notebook
description: A Jupyter Notebook application that performs in-depth analysis of a given book, identifying the most used words and conducting sentiment analysis.

title: Diary Tone Analyzer App
description: An advanced application designed to analyze the tone of diary entries using NLP, and plot the positivity and negativity trends of each entry over time.

title: Webcam Object Detection App
description: An intelligent object detection application that uses webcam input to identify new shop visitors and sends an email notification with their picture.

title: Django Job Application Web App
description: A web application powered by Python and Django, designed to process job application forms, store information in a database, and allow admins to easily view the data on the admin panel.

title: Django Restaurant Menu Web App
description: A Django web application which powers a restaurant menu showcasing different categories of foods and their availabilities.

title: GPT Chatbot App
description: A PyQT6 application powered by OpenAI's ChatGPT language model, allowing for asynchronous chat between user and bot

title: When You Were There Game
description: A Unity 2D Touhou Fan Game based on immortality where players perform the same tasks each day.
